name: Diet Dash!
description:
Diet Drive!

How to play:

Classic kart racing game, with a twist!  Do a lap as fast as you can, but watch out, because the burgers lining the tracks will slow you down. The less weight you carry, the more speed you get!

CONTROLS 

Car controls : WASD

-Mouse to select options

Hi, this is my first game jam (as you can probably tell).
